text: The Brazen Serpent is a 1630–1640 painting by the Aragonese artist Jusepe Leonardo, now in the Real Academia de Bellas Artes de San Fernando in Madrid. It shows the story from Book of Numbers 21: 6–9.V. V. A. A. (2010). Mitología clásica e iconografía cristiana, pág. 224. R. Areces. . ==References== category:Spanish paintings category:Paintings of the Real Academia de Bellas Artes de San Fernando Category:Snakes in art category:1630s paintings Category:Paintings depicting Moses
title: The Brazen Serpent (Leonardo)
